author: weaver
msg: Makes the current RequestContext available to the processAction() method of the invoked portlet.

author: weaver
msg: prefered locale made available to the request.

author: weaver
msg: implemented the setAttribute interface to automatically namespace encode jetspeed attributes, prefixed with "org.apache.jetspeed"
so they are accessible from portlets.  Accessing these attributes obiviously makes these portlets non-portable, however it makes
creating admin and jetspeed-specific portlets much easier.  For example,  LocaleSelectorPortlet now sets the  prefered language for
the entire portal (only for the current user session) by accessing the the org.apache.jetspeed.request.RequestContext attribute.
